CREATE TABLE CustomerQueries(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

  response_text TEXT,
  is_resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE)

  trigger_sql TEXT)

  trigger_id INT,
  log_message TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP)

  query_id INT,
  response_id INT,
  response_timestamp TIMESTAMP)
